pullRequest.title: Use a batched style to get series type
pullRequest.bodyText:
Datatypes of timeseries are required during the query process to construct filters, readers, and datasets. They are currently determined in a one-by-one style and this PR will change it to a batched style which incurs the following benefits:

Reduced method calls and increased locality
Reduced communications in the distributed version
Possibly reduced datatype queries of the same series
The main affected classes are PhysicalGenerator, TSServiceImpl, and ConcatPathOptimizer.

commit.message: Use a batched style to get series type in PhysicalGenerator, TSServiceImpl and ConcatPathOptimizer
